articles.title: Remember the hysteria over Trump's tax returns?
articles.description: REMEMBER THE HYSTERIA OVER TRUMP'S TAX RETURNS? On Dec. 30, as Washington shut down for the Christmas-New Year holidays and Republicans prepared to take over the House of Representatives, Democrats on the House Ways and Means Committee, in their final days of power, released copies of former President Donald Trump's tax returns from 2015 through 2020.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: YEARENDER-The Republican wave that wasn't could dim Trump's White House hopes
articles.description: The 2022 midterm vote in the United States was a story of great expectations. Given the public's sour mood over the direction of the country and with inflation rampant, Republicans had high hopes of seizing control of the U.S. Congress from Democrats, perhaps grabbing dozens of seats in a so-called "red wave" in the House of Representatives in the process.
